ProjectTitle: The Decolonization of the Roman Catholic Church in the DRC / Zaire
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/03/2023
Please note that you used an older DMP template, BOF now uses the Flemish standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be or if you prefer a word template you can use the one from FWO that you can find here: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/. Please use this template for your future DMPs. 
Data: Please note that the use of existing literature for analysis is considered data reuse. 
Is ethics review also included in your PRET approval? although this may not be mandatory it is recommended to include ethics review for all research involving human participants: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanparticipants
Documentation: For help selecting a metadata standard please contact rdm@kuleuven.be
Preservation: If you use onedrive for preservation please make sure the data is on your own onedrive and not on those of students/postdocs, onedrive is linked to the researcher's account and expires after they leave 
Sharing: Please note that KU Leuven now has a data repository RDR that you can use as alternative for Zenodo (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
